Home.title: Track your beloved love/hate feeling over time
Home.subtitle: Create a page for the person you want to track the mood of, and share the link with them!
Home.disclaimer: No registration required, don't lose your link!
Home.voteDescription: Vote from -10 to +10 your hate level and get a graph of your mood over time
Home.notesPhotosDescription: Add notes and photos to your mood. You can decide to make it public or not and when
Home.bottleMessagesDescription: Leave a message to your haters on their page. It will be visible for 24 hours only
Home.passesDescription: Create passes for your haters. Want to create a free pass for a dinner out? You can do it here
Home.startJourneyDescription: Use the form below to create your hater's or yours page.

Forms.name: Name
Forms.showOnDescription: When you want the note to be visible
Forms.passIcon: Set an icon for the pass

Page.title: Hey {name}!
Page.subtitle: Someone thinks you hate them (or not?). Well, good for you! Track it here.
Page.wantTrack: Want to track someone's mood? Click

setPassword.start: To start tracking, {name} must set a password. This will permit just them to update their scores and see their notes.
setPassword.send: Send this link to them and let them set their password by themselves, don't be a dick!
setPassword.insert: Please insert your password to vote

bottleMessage.message: Someone left a message for you, check it out!

modal.title: Leave a message
modal.description: You can leave a message here for {name}. You can leave one message a time and it lasts for 24 hours only.

bottleMessage.title: Leave a message for {name}

Page.spotifyLogin: Want some music suggestions based on your mood? Login with your Spotify account below

modal.title: Send a rocket message
modal.description: Have you ever wanted to say something to {name} but you didn't feel like doing it? Send a rocket message, {name} will never know you did it or what the message is about, but you'll feel better!

quickThought.title: Leave a quick thought to {name}
quickThought.message: Someone was thinking about you on {time}

gifts.title: Buy a gift for {name}
gifts.message: You received a gift in the last 24 hours

missingMeter.title: Tell {name} how much you miss them

Person.errorCreate: Error while creating the person, please try again
Person.errorPassword: Error while setting the password, please try again
